item.title: ISLR Chapter 6: Linear Model Selection and Regularization (Part 2: Shrinkage Methods)
item.description: 6.2 Shrinkage Methods As an alternative to subset selection methods, a model containing all the $p$ predictors can be fit using a technique that constrains or regularizes the coefficient estimates (or shrinks the coefficeint estimates towards 0).
